item.description:
Put on your dancing shoes and join us for our springtime dance party!

This year's Spring Fling is at a gorgeous facility in Dedham (The Cathedral) where we will enjoy the music of an 8-piece band called The Groove Street Band.   This dance is sure to be fun!

 

The Groove Street Band is a group of professional musicians from diverse backgrounds who came together based on a mutual connection with music that touches the soul and gets the dance floor moving. Not to be tied down by any musical genre, they touch upon many musical influences including Motown, Rock, Blues, Funk, Soul, Reggae and R&B. The only requirement is that the song grooves and makes you want to move.With The Groove Street Band, you are guaranteed an entertaining and unforgettable experience!

(http://www.thegroovestreetband.com/index.html)

 

We have also created an unique method of mixing dance partners, similar to dance cards to help everyone mix and mingle with ease!  Come and join us for a wonderful dance to celebrate spring!!

 

Dress: Jacket & tie for men, dresses or suits for women.

There will be a light buffet and cash bar.

 

Directions:

* Rt.95 (128) to Rte 135 - Ext. 17 West. 

* Go 2/10 mile toward Needham/Natick.

* After 374 feet, turn left into the parking lot for St. John's Hall/ The Cathedral.

The Cathedral is a free standing building with its own parking lot. It is a great location and easy to find. It is the first building off of 128 at Exit 17.

Since there are no other parking lots in the vicinity, the Dance Committee is requesting that individuals coming to the dance try to carpool as much as possible so there will be parking for all attendees.

 

Questions? 

Please contact Michael Baer at soldieradoptmike@yahoo.com
item.how_to_find_us: Please be aware that this is one of several sites for RSVPs - we have a LOT of folks coming, not just what you see here! :)
item.name: Spring Fling Dance!
